mentions.context: Recombination maps were estimated for each sex using poisson regression on crossover (CO) counts observed in non-overlapping 1 Mb intervals along the genome using the glm procedure in R. Sex-specific recombination maps were estimated considering each population by sex as a group in a Poisson-Log-Normal Model framework using the PLNmodels R package (Chiquet, Mariadassou, and Robin 2021).
